title: to be or not to be caslon or didot ?
content:
Hi  
My boss is driving me crazy looking for this font. Is it a Caslon or a Didot or is it personalised for Vogue Paris?  
thanks for help i have been looking all day for this font.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [vogue paris.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150403014815/http:/typophile.com/files/vogue%20paris.png) | 36.08 KB |
author: energy

comments.content: Caslon. I can't find a weight that has that degree of contrast between the strokes and terminals though ...
